Event.name: Assemble
Event.definition: <def-root>In this frame a group of <fen>Individuals</fen> intentionally come together to form a <fen>Group</fen>. Alternatively, a grammatically more prominent <fen>Party_1</fen> assembles with a <fen>Party_2</fen>, expressed as an oblique phrase. If this asymmetric construal is chosen, <fen>Purpose</fen> only relates to <fen>Party_1</fen>. <ex><fex name="Individuals">We</fex> <t>assembled</t> <fex name="Place">in the courtyard</fex> <fex name="Purpose">to talk about our future plans</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Group">Our study group</fex> is <t>convening</t> <fex name="Place">outside</fex> <fex name="Time">today</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Party_1">The Dodgers</fex> <t>meet</t> <fex name="Party_2">the San Francisco Giants</fex> <fex name="Time">tomorrow</fex> <fex name="Place">at Dodger Stadium</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Individuals
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Individuals</fen> are self-movers who intentionally assemble together.</def-root>

Arg.name: Group
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Group</fen> describes the resulting formation of the <fen>Individuals</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Party_1
Arg.definition: <def-root><fen>Party_1</fen> is the grammatically more prominent participant in the assembling event. It can refer to either a single individual or a larger party separate from <fen>Party_2</fen> previous to the assembling.</def-root>

Arg.name: Party_2
Arg.definition: <def-root>A grammatically less prominent participant in the assembling event. It can refer to either a single individual or a larger party separate from <fen>Party_1</fen> previous to the assembling.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>Any description of the assembling which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (<ment>quietly, loudly</ment>), and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). In addition, it may indicate salient characteristics of the <fen>Individuals</fen> or <fen>Group</fen> that also affect the action (<ment>presumptuously, coldly, eagerly, carefully</ment>). </def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Means</fen> descibes the way in which the <fen>Individuals</fen> accomplish the assembling.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>An action that the <fen>Group</fen> plans to engage in upon assembly.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: meet.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to intentionally come together for some collective purpose

lexUnit.name: convene.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to assemble for a public purpose
